docstring: This is the perliminary data model for CRC 1333 project B07. At the current time, the data model is still under development and major changes can occur at any time. Please feel free to make changes and contribute to the project.

date.description: Date/time when the dataset was created

authors.description: Persons who worked on the dataset

subjects.description: Research subjects covered by the datset

keywords.description: Descriptive keywords to describe the dataset

Dataset.docstring: This is a preliminary root container for all (meta-)data.

affiliation.description: Organisation the author is affiliated with.

email.description: Contact e-mail address of the author

phone.description: Contact phone number of the author

Author.docstring: Container for information regarding persons who worked on a dataset.

scheme.description: Type or scheme of personal identifier

identifier.description: String representation of the personal identifier

PersonalID.docstring: Container for personal identifiers related to an author

reactants.description: All reactants that are involved in the reaction

Synthesis.docstring: All information directly related to the synthesis.

name.description: If possible IUPAC name of the compound

pureness.description: Pureness of the compound in percent

supplier.description: Name of the supplier of the compound

stoichiometry.description: Stoichiometric information like equivalents, mass, amount of substance, volume

state_of_matter.description: s for solid, l for liquid and g for gaseous

ChemicalCompound.docstring: A chemical compound or mixtures thereof.

Reactant.docstring: Compound that is involved in the chemical reaction, either as the product, educt, catalyst or cocatalyst.

equivalents.description: Used equivalents in relation to the reference compound

amount_of_substance.description: Amount of substance n in mmol

mass.description: Used mass of the compound in g

molar_mass.description: Molar mass of the compound in g per mol

Apparatus.docstring: Used appratuses and special equippment or techniques for the synthesis.

m_poly_in_grams.description: Mass of the Polymer in grams

notice.description: Here you can write down additional notes.

FilmPreparation.docstring: Preparation of a film of the investigated polymer for carbonization.

PhysicalParameter.docstring: All physical parameters that are relevant for the chemical reaction.

Analysis.docstring: Different analyzation techniques for products investigation.

NMREINSH.docstring: Nuclear magnetic resonance spectroscopy for detection of protons.

Carbonization.docstring: Heating process to burn organic substances.

ordered.description: If a crystalline structure is present

q10_to_q11_ratio.description: Ratio of the scattering vectors 10 and 11

q10_to_q20_ratio.description: Ratio of the scattering vectors 10 and 20

q10_to_q21_ratio.description: Ratio of the scattering vectors 10 and 21

notice.description: Here you can write down additional notes

Physisorption.docstring: Analytical method for the determination of the specific surface area of a substance.
